original_body_lines: The Synergia Foundation had the Synergia Conclave 2023, a three-day conference held from November 17th to 19th, at the Ritz Carlton Hotel in Bangalore, India. The event focused on “The Future of Advanced Technologies, Global Diplomacy, and National Security,” and brought together policymakers, security experts, technologists, scientists, academicians, and industry leaders from around the world to exchange ideas and solutions.

The conference was attended by senior-level delegates from Bangladesh, India, Myanmar, Maldives, Nepal, Sri Lanka and Thailand, who participated in two sessions. The first session focused on India’s Neighborhood and Techno Diplomacy: Challenges and Opportunities for Integration, while the second session was dedicated to Multi-Domain Warfare and Industrial Wargaming.
